#summary The fb.fbWidget Plugin API for re-usable field setting components to be used by plugin that extends from it.
#labels Featured,Phase-Design

= Overview =
The fb.fbWidget Plugin API will be described in table that has 4 columns such as No., Field Setting, API, Sample Code. Most function of this plugin accept one parameter: the options object in the following structure:
{{{
var options = {
  label: 'Label of Field Setting',
  name : 'field.name',
  value: 'Default Value',
  description: 'Field Setting Description' // display as context sensitive help 
};
}}}
